stories.text: While this field was built by the efforts of countless brilliant people, who are, in your opinion, the ones who had the most influence? People who worked on the "computer" side of the field, and not just mathematicians.
stories.title: Ask HN: Who are the most influential computer scientists in history?

stories.text:
Hi,

I'd like to learn more about database threat detection.

How do you detect threats to the database at your company or within your projects?

What products do you use, how do you configure them, and what resources do you recommend reading?

I’m not interested in how to secure a database using privileges/roles, data masking, IP sec, etc.

This thread is purely about threat detection.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you do threat detection for databases?
